RylandsLat394.Transcription: The halt and the blyndeeuer ben be hynde
RylandsLat394.Note:
Translating ‘Claudi cecati retro sunt velut
                    expeditati’, which follows.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 93.
